DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety diclofenac 1.16 % gel compare placebo apply four time day subject acute neck pain .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Diclofenac 1.16 % Gel Subjects With Acute Neck Pain
DOC.criteria: Male female subject , age range 18 . Patient acute neck pain meeting baseline pain intensity level duration Pain medication take within 6 hour precede randomization . Patient chronic neck pain define pain 3 month longer Any neck pain attributable organic disease , prolapse disc , spondylolisthesis , osteomalacia , inflammatory arthritis , metabolic , neurological disease tumor . Any recent strain neck muscle document clinical evaluation anamnesis
